basics.name: Josh Fisher
basics.label: Crypto Wizard
basics.summary: Over the past 7 years I have continuously challenged myself with new languages, frameworks and methodologies. I had the first legal Bitcoin ATM in the state of Oregon in 2014, since then I have been living and breathing crypto currency and financial markets.

work.summary: Launched the first legally approved by the State of Oregon Division of Fincial Regulation in 2014, exited and sold the machines and business process in early 2017.
highlights: 1,500 BTC volume in first year of operations
Access control with HSM (Yubikey) and OpenPGP used as SSH
Security of bitcoin hot-wallet on Amazon AWS with zero hacks or thefts in 3 years of operations with significant bitcoin value targets

work.summary: General title and due diligence rerporting of all mineral rights, as well as surface rights for energy industry production or supply line purposes.
highlights: PipelineXXL Right of way and mineral title
